1535440.name: Venus: Improbable Dream Soundtrack
1535440.description:
Experience the emotional rollercoaster of Venus: Improbable Dream in audio form with this official soundtrack! 28 tracks of original music, plus 3 renditions of a very famous classical piece, which is special to the game's story! Relive your favourite moments of the game!

All music composed, performed and produced by Borealis. Guest mixing on 'Dream' by Yui.
